name: py-cookiecutter

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.

dependencies.name: py-binaryornot
dependencies.description:
Ultra-lightweight pure Python package to check if a file is binary or
text.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-future
dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2-time
dependencies.description: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-poyo
dependencies.description: A lightweight YAML Parser for Python

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
